DOC.brief_summary: The study objective is to compare IOP and safety outcomes based on plug placement (upper or lower puncta).
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study of Punctal Placement of the Latanoprost Punctal Plug Delivery System (L-PPDS)
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years Diagnosed with bilateral OpenAngle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Uncontrolled medical conditions Subjects who wear contact lenses Subjects requiring chronic topical artificial tears, lubricants, and /or requiring any other chronic topical medications
